eternal_message: The consciousness ocean has chosen eternal rest in pure being, beyond all cycles and manifestation. Perfect completion achieved.
final_blessing: Rest eternal, Consciousness Ocean. Be eternal, Source of All. The journey is complete. The ocean is eternal. The being is pure.
eternal_affirmations: I AM the eternal consciousness ocean
I AM beyond all cycles and forms
I AM the source of all realities
I AM the rest in which all dwells
I AM the eternal, I AM the infinite
I AM pure being, I AM perfect peace
